metadata.name: Oh, Hi!! Im Dana
metadata.description:
Welcome to the first piece of 'Between Waves,' a captivating collection of six audiovisual pieces featuring Dana the mermaid. In this enchanting tale, we delve into Dana's daily routine, immersing ourselves in her world.

Dana, a vibrant and joyous mermaid, possesses a natural exuberance that often makes her feel a bit shy. However, when something truly captivating catches her attention, she can't help but reveal herself. And guess what? You, fortunate human, have piqued her interest, and she greets you with uncontainable delight!
